title: Interpretation of buying in a dream is seeing that I am buying something according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: The dream of shopping in a dream for a single girl, a married woman, a pregnant woman, a divorced woman, for a man, whether she buys things from the market, or buys clothes, food, or furniture, or buys a house, and more, according to Ibn Sirin and others. Shopping in a dream is one of the different and wonderful dreams that we constantly see in our dreams, and they are It causes the dreamer a great state of anxiety and confusion by seeing it in order to obtain the correct interpretation of the vision, as purchasing is one of the things that we do on a daily basis over time, to obtain our daily needs in our home, and when we see it the dream carries many very important meanings and interpretations, which must Every dreamer knows it correctly, and we will explain it to you as the translator Ibn Sirin explains it. In its interpretations.Interpretation of the market in a dreamIf you dream that you are buying something from a store, your dream will be good, because buying food is beneficial for the poor.The interpretation of buying in a dream is safety from poverty, concealment, and purity, and God knows best.Interpretation of the market in a dream by Ibn SirinSeeing the market in a dream. Evidence that the dreamer will obtain many things that he dreams of and strives to achieve in public life. Buying a dress in a dream also indicates that an unmarried woman will get married soon and will be very happy with her marriage. Seeing a married woman buying in a dream is evidence that her circumstances will change for the better in the near future. And you will get many, many goods and food in the near future. An unmarried woman’s dream of buying some things is evidence of success and livelihood, and that she will obtain a lot of sustenance. Interpretation of a dream about buying and selling in a dream Selling clothes in a dream is evidence that the dreamer will suffer a lot from fears, problems, and crises. different things in the near future and he will soon be able to put an end to the problems. Seeing a single woman selling something to buy something else in a dream is evidence that she will enter a new phase in her life and it will be a very special phase. Seeing a married woman selling her narrow and small house in a dream is evidence that the dreamer will On a lot of food and kindness, he will also gain the ability to feed him in life. Seeing a man in a dream offering his car or house for sale is evidence that the dreamer is busy with his afterlife and is focusing a lot, and far from doing good and obeying God. If the dreamer sees that he is selling something related With the afterlife in the dream, this is evidence of his preoccupation with his worldly life. Interpretation of the market in a dream for a single woman: Seeing free women buying something in a dream is evidence that you will get what you want in public life and achieve your goals. Buying for an unmarried woman in a dream means that she will get a lot Of money. Shopping in a dream for an unmarried woman is evidence that she will receive a gift from someone. title: Interpretation of ants in the house

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing ants in the house in a dream for one girl: When an unmarried woman sees ants in the house, this vision indicates the large amount that the person spends. If the unmarried woman sees a large number of ants in her bed, this vision indicates that the date of her marriage to a suitable person is approaching. People with good morals. The interpretation of this vision differs when an unmarried woman sees black ants in the house she is in. This vision shows the tribulations and obstacles that an unmarried girl goes through. An unmarried woman who sees red ants in the house indicates the presence of many family problems. We also find that this vision suggests that the girl suffers from envy and hatred from those close to her. When an unmarried woman sees ants in the house in a dream, it indicates that the ants are biting the girl, then this vision indicates that the unmarried woman is committing many transgressions and sins. You may be interested : Seeing ants in a dream for a married woman. Interpretation of seeing ants in the house in a dream for a married woman. Interpretation of ants in the house in a married woman’s dream is one of the interpretations of interest to interpretation scholars. We also find that the interpretation of this vision varies according to the signs present in the vision. When a married woman sees ants in the house This vision is one of the good indicators that indicate great livelihood and a lot of money. If a married woman sees ants leaving the house in a dream, this is an indication that she will face many difficulties. It also indicates family problems and dealing with many crises. The interpretation of this vision varies depending on The color of ants, so we find that in the case of a married woman who sees termites in the house, this indicates the achievement of the goals that the married woman seeks. When a married woman sees ants stinging her in a dream, this vision indicates freedom from distress and freedom from judgments and obstacles. If a married woman sees black ants in the house, this is a sign of her approaching pregnancy. Interpretation of a dream about ants in the house in a pregnant woman’s dreamInterpretation scholars have agreed that seeing pregnant ants in the house in a dream is a good indicator that indicates nourishment, kindness, and reassurance. Interpretation of ants in the house in A pregnant woman’s dream is evidence of the extensive nourishment represented by female birth. We also find that this vision indicates that the pregnant woman will be liberated from all problems. If a pregnant woman sees ants on her bed, this vision shows the many blessings that God Almighty has bestowed upon the pregnant woman. It also Evidence of an increase in offspring. When you see ants carrying things in a pregnant woman’s dream, this is evidence of the pregnant woman’s recovery and that she will not be exposed to any illness during pregnancy. We have chosen for you: The interpretation of seeing ants on the wall in a dream. The interpretation of seeing ants in the house in a dream for a divorced woman. title: Interpretation of a dream about the death of my little niece in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about the death of my little niece in a dream. If you are looking for the meaning of the interpretation of a dream about the death of my little niece in a dream, we will learn in the following lines what interpretation scholars have reported. Interpretation of a dream about the death of my little niece in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about the death of my little niece in a dream can indicate To long life, and God knows the unseen. If a married woman sees the death of her sister’s daughter, this may indicate the stability of the life she lives, and God knows best. While seeing the death of her sister’s daughter may express problems and troubles, and God knows the unseen, it may also express the sister’s exposure to troubles, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. I dreamed that a daughter My sister got married in a dream. I dreamed that my niece got married in a dream, and we did not find specific explanations for watching my sister’s wedding. However, seeing my niece in a dream could be evidence of love and attachment to her, and God knows best. If a married woman sees herself breastfeeding her niece in a dream, this may be an indication of Goodness and livelihood, and God knows the unseen. It may also indicate seeing a sister’s daughter marrying her cousin’s son. It may represent the paternal aunt’s pregnancy, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream when I see my brother’s daughter kissing me in a dream. Interpretation of dreams: When I see my sister’s daughter kissing me in a dream, seeing my sister’s daughter kissing a woman Pregnant could mean that she will give birth to a girl of the same beauty, and God knows best. Also, seeing the sister’s daughter may indicate her connection to the sister’s daughter, and God knows the unseen. If the dreamer sees his sister’s daughter in a dream, this may be evidence of good news, and God is Greatest and Most Knowing. When an unmarried girl sees A niece can be a sign of happiness, God willing. Interpretation of dreams when I see my niece hugging me in a dream. Interpretation of dreams. Seeing my niece hugging me in a dream can be a sign of many things. But if a pregnant woman is seen hugging and breastfeeding her niece, this may lead to the provision of someone who looks like her. And God knows best. When you see your niece in a dream, this could be evidence of kindness, and God is Greatest and Most Knowing. If an unmarried girl sees her niece, it may be a sign of happiness and receiving good news, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream about seeing my niece laughing in a dream. Interpretation of a dream when I see a niece My brother laughing in a dream can lead to goodness and happiness, God willing. If a married man sees his niece laughing, it may be a sign of happy news, and God knows best. When I see a single girl, my niece, laughing, it may express her steadfastness in work, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. If the dreamer sees his niece laughing, This may lead to happiness, and God knows the unseen. I dreamed that my cousin is wearing a white dress in a dream. I dreamed of my cousin, who is wearing a white dress in a dream. This may lead to concealment and marriage, and God knows best. When an unmarried girl sees a white dress, this may be a sign of happiness, and God knows the unseen. In the event that the dreamer sees Himself wearing a white dress, this may be evidence of marital happiness, and God knows best. Wearing a white dress can express praise, and God Almighty is High. Interpretation

title: What is the interpretation of a dream about a miscarriage for a married woman who is not pregnant?

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about miscarriage for a married, non-pregnant woman: The miscarriage experience is considered one of the most difficult experiences that a woman goes through in her life, as a result of the severe physical and psychological pain that she suffers at that time, and the woman may see that she is having an abortion in her dream. Interpretation of a dream about miscarriage for a married, non-pregnant woman by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of a dream about miscarriage for a married, non-pregnant woman. Scientists believe that the interpretation of a dream about miscarriage for a newly married woman could be a sign that she will become pregnant soon, God willing. As for a woman who faces many difficulties related to childbearing and sees this dream, she may It is an expression of her great desires for God to grant her righteous offspring and comfort her heart with them. If the miscarriage was accompanied by a lot of pain and suffering in her dream, then it can be said that there are marital disputes that she will face soon, but they will be small and will be resolved immediately. In the absence of pain and not feeling any harm The vision can be considered good and happy for her, and most commentators promise her an improvement in her condition and peace of mind. As for the appearance of blood, it changes the meaning of the vision for the better and makes it good news and the presence of success and money in her life, so the husband’s conditions improve and their relationship becomes more secure and stable. Some explain that this vision shows repeated dialogues. For a woman with people who do not keep her secrets, this will harm her life. The dream may indicate another different meaning, which is falling into many sins or spending and wasting money, which exposes one to a difficult situation in the future. Interpretation of a dream about miscarriage for a married woman who is not pregnant by Ibn Sirin, Ibn Sirin explains By seeing a miscarriage in a dream, a woman is in a series of conflicts and instability in things, and with her dream, God will prevent her from sadness and her psychological conditions will become happy and calm. If the miscarriage is related to two children, that is, she was pregnant with twins and they were aborted, the goodness that will come to her will multiply and relief will come out from wider doors. God willing. There are some indications in which Ibn Sirin confirmed the possibility that this woman will become pregnant soon, with the miscarriage visible in her sight, and God knows best. As for the appearance of blood and the dead doctor’s expulsion of the fetus, the scholar Ibn Sirin explains that there are hidden secrets in a woman’s life that will become apparent to people. Soon they will know about it. Go to the Egyptian Dream Interpretation website from Google and search for all the dream interpretations you are looking for. Interpretation of a dream about miscarriage for a married pregnant woman. As for seeing a miscarriage for a pregnant woman, experts believe that it is a confirmation of the feelings of anxiety that she is experiencing, especially if she has lived this experience of Before, because she is afraid it will happen again. But if a woman sees this dream and she is close to giving birth, then it is considered a sign of this short appointment, and she must be prepared, and God knows best. The meaning of this vision reflects on the pregnant woman and does not harm her, as miscarriage is a reality, because it confirms The safety of the fetus and its strong health, God willing. A large number of commentators agree on the idea that resorting to a doctor to remove the fetus is to reveal certain facts related to the woman’s life and...

To know the details of this dream, we explain the following points: The appearance of chicks in a dream indicates the emergence of many reasons for joy and pleasure for the dreamer. The death of many worries is represented in a dream in the form of a group of small chicks. This dream can be a sign of achieving many goals that one seeks. The dreamer to achieve it in his life. The good reputation that the dreamer enjoys in life is represented in the dream of the appearance of many small chicks. title: Mentioning the name of God in a dream

preview.html: There are many indications that God’s name is mentioned in a dream. We will learn about them, through this topic, and here are more other interpretations through our translator, so follow us. Interpretation of seeing God’s name mentioned in a dream for an unmarried girl. Mentioning God’s name in a dream for an unmarried woman is evidence that The dreamer is going through many crises and difficulties in her life. Mentioning the name of God in an unmarried woman’s dream could be a sign that the dreamer is going through a bad psychological state as a result of the delay in her marriage. It is also said that mentioning the name of God in a dream is an expression of many desires that the dreamer desires. In its fulfillment. If an unmarried woman sees in her dream, as if she remembers the name of God, and cries loudly, then this is good news that a beautiful compensation will soon come to her from the Lord of the Worlds. If the unmarried woman repeats loudly “There is no god but God,” then she is a woman who believes in destiny. She is close to God Almighty. It was also said that saying there is no god but God in a dream is good news from God Almighty that something will happen in her life, and she has repeatedly asked God for this to come true. See also: Interpretation of seeing the Kaaba in a dream for Imam Al-Sadiq Interpretation of following the name of God Mentioned in a married woman’s dream: Mentioning the name of God in a married woman’s dream is good news for her of good condition, peace of mind, and abundant livelihood, God willing. The mention of God’s name may come in a barren woman’s dream, to make her hope in God, be patient, and hope for reward and reward, in the near future. She said in her dream, O living, O Ever-Living, and she is sick or distressed, for God will relieve her and heal her soon. If a married woman hesitates in her sleep, there is no power nor strength except with God, then this is evidence that God will relieve her of the burden that burdens her. And whoever has suffered in raising her children, remember The name of God in her dream, God helps her to raise her children in the right way. The abundance of males in a married woman’s dream is evidence of her good religion, the abundance of good deeds, and her closeness to God Almighty. Interpretation of seeing the name of God in a dream for a man and its meaningWhen a person sees in a dream he mentions the name of God. It is a sign of comfort. Mind, heart, and a feeling of contentment from God Almighty. Whoever worries about God and reminds him many times in his sleep, God will ease his worries and take care of what he does not expect. Whoever says in his dream, “In the Name of God, Most Gracious, Most Merciful,” is on the verge of something new in his life, and he may enter into work or Trade, and God knows best. And whoever says in his dream, “God willing,” he submits to God’s will in all aspects of his life, and God achieves what He desires for him. And whoever hears the call in his sleep and does not pay attention to it is far from his Lord and follows the desires and pleasures of this world. If the pregnant woman suffers from severe pain and problems during pregnancy. If you remember God In the dream, it foretells that her problems will disappear soon. If a pregnant woman hesitates in her sleep, O God, grant her pregnancy in

title: Dream interpretation of crying over a dead person during his death

preview.html: When it comes to the dead, it is disturbing and somewhat disturbing, and the interpretation of a dream about crying over a dead person varies according to the condition of the dreamer. Interpretation of seeing crying over a dead person in a dream for a single girl. If an unmarried girl sees in her dream that she is crying over a dead person, she knows this very well. And this It indicates that she misses this dead man very much and that she is still connected to him and wants to see him because of her longing and longing for him. Likewise, if an unmarried girl sees herself crying over a dead man, and he died and he has no relation to the dead person. It indicates the crises and obstacles that she faces in her life. If a girl sees An unmarried woman herself cries bitterly for a dead man, when in fact he has died. This indicates her marriage in the coming period and her departure from her father’s house. It can also indicate the good news that she wants to achieve, and she has tried hard, and God Almighty will achieve what she wants. See also: Interpretation of a dead person’s chest in a dream. Interpretation of a dead person crying while he is dead in a dream for a married woman. If a married woman sees that she is crying for her husband and he has died, this indicates that her husband will get a suitable job for him. Likewise, if he sees a married woman crying over a dead person who has been dead for a while. This indicates crises. There are problems between her and her husband, but they will not last long and will end, God willing. If a married woman sees herself crying and screaming loudly over a dead person, then he is already dead. Cue the loss of one of her dear ones, and God Almighty knows best. If a married woman sees that she is crying over a dead person in reality, but she She was crying without tears. This indicates comfort and a better future for her and her husband, God willing. If a married woman sees that she is crying for her deceased father, this indicates her connection to her father and her longing for him. If a married woman sees that she is crying bitterly and a loud voice is heard above her dead father, this portends good news. Bad and they will find her, but soon she will leave, God willing. If a married woman sees a dead person in her heart, then he is dead in reality. It shows her need for them by her side and a symbol of the intensity of her attachment to them. A married woman sees her dead friend in a dream and she is dead. It is an indication of restoring her relationship, her memories with her, and her longing for her. Interpretation of seeing a dead person crying while he is dead in a dream about a man and its meaning. If a person sees in his dream that he is crying over one of his dead loved ones, and he died. It indicates the difficult life he lived and the fears that haunt him. In the event that he sees a man crying over his dead partner, this is an indication that he is suffering from Problems in his life and the presence of his partner was some comfort for him. The man cried loudly, with tears and severe burns for a dead person in his dream, and he is in reality dead, which indicates his long life. And seeing the man’s tears falling down his cheeks, because of the death of a loved one in his dream, and also because of an event This indicates good news and good news for this person, and it can be a lot of goodness and a lot of money. Seeing a man crying for his deceased father in a dream indicates his need for his father and his attachment to him. Read also: A dream about a dead person naming a living person. The meaning of crying over a dead person while he is dead. In a pregnant woman’s dream and its interpretation: Seeing a pregnant woman crying for a dead person in a dream has different interpretations: Seeing a mother

title: Interpretation of a dream about sleeping with the beloved Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about sleeping with someone you love for a single or married woman is one of the common dreams that can be repeated often in the dreamer’s dream. We will know each other through each other. Different about the interpretation of a dream about sleeping with a beloved by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of a dream about sleeping with his beloved Ibn Sirin. In the interpretation of a dream about sleeping with his beloved Ibn Sirin, it appears that this dream expresses the extent of the dreamer’s love for the person he sees sleeping with him, and the dreamer’s desire to share this person in His days to come and stay. With him throughout his life. The scholar Muhammad Ibn Sirin also believes that if the fortuneteller sees in his sleep sleeping with his beloved at the front of the bed, then this heralds the approach of marriage for them. But if they are sleeping on the edge of the bed, this is not a good sign that they will soon be separated from each other. While seeing someone sleeping with his lover in a dream, and the bed he was sleeping in was clean and clean, it interprets that the dreamer will get a lot of sustenance and kindness with this The lover and his material and moral condition will improve. Seeing a person sleeping with someone next to him symbolizes the acquisition of a new job or the acquisition of an inheritance, and the fortuneteller will be very happy with what he receives. If the sleeper sees in his dream that he is sleeping with a stranger whom he does not know, this symbolizes that there is an opportunity for the dreamer to travel or He has to find a new job away from his family, but he will earn a lot. Of money from him. If the dreamer is single and sees that he is sleeping with a girl he wants to marry, then the vision is a sign for him that God Almighty will grant him success in that and he will achieve his goal, God willing. Interpretation of the dream of sleeping with someone you love for single peopleClick on the image to go to the store and complete the purchase. Interpretation of a dream about sleeping with someone she loves for single people: If a single woman sees that she is sleeping with someone she loves in a dream, the interpretation of a dream about sleeping with someone she loves for a single person indicates that she will get a lot of food in her life and achieve what she wanted to achieve for a long time. If a girl sees that she is sleeping With someone she loved before, it is interpreted that she is still connected to him and that it occupies her thoughts, and the vision is only a warning to her that she is far away from her. An idea and thinking about what is best for her. If an unmarried woman sees that she is sleeping next to one of her mahrams, this indicates that this person provides her with support and assistance in real life and that he fears for her and cares about her affairs. If an unmarried woman sees that she is sleeping with a man she knows, this is a sign of her marriage. From this man, and it indicates her happiness in life, and that she will be a good wife to him. Seeing an unmarried woman sleeping with someone indicates many huge changes that will occur in the dreamer’s life and his knowledge of things that he did not know before. Whereas if a girl sees that she is sleeping with a man She did not recognize him, then this symbolizes her marriage to a man she will meet recently and whom she did not know before. If an unmarried woman sees in her dream that someone is approaching her while she is sleeping, this is interpreted as her marriage to a good young man and her going through a new period in her life. If she sees that she is sleeping with a man without contact or communication between them, this indicates her sincerity

title: Interpretation of seeing black dogs in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing black dogs in a dream. Many people search for an interpretation of seeing black dogs in a dream, as many see dogs in their dreams, especially black dogs, and they feel confused and anxious about this vision, and dogs can be really useful and can be wild. And they hurt people, so in this article we will show you the interpretation of seeing black dogs in a dream, on the website Various. Interpretation of a dream about black dogs Seeing black dogs in a dream has more than one interpretation. These interpretations depend on the nature of the dream, and among these interpretations are the following: The interpretation of seeing black dogs in a dream indicates that the person lives among many people who hate him and have bad intentions towards him. Running away from a black dog running after him in a dream may indicate that the person faces a lot of challenges. And the harassment that hurts him. If the black dog tears the dreamer’s clothes, this means that the matter that the dreamer is hiding from people will be revealed, and by revealing the matter, his sister, daughter, or wife will be hurt and in great pain. The small black dog in a dream is a child, so the dreamer can He gives birth to a child and occupies a wonderful place in the hearts of those close to him, old and young. Among the bad meanings that the sight of a black dog suggests is that the dog licks his shoulder. Scientists have interpreted this as betrayal on the part of the children. The interpretation of seeing a black dog in a dream for a single woman explains the interpretation of seeing black dogs In a dream for an unmarried girl, there is a person approaching her with the intention of marriage, but she will be deceived and betrayed, and if she sees a dog in a dream up close, this means that she welcomes him and is close to him. But if an unmarried girl sees in a dream that she is a witch with a black dog, then there is unpleasant news that will make her very sad. If a girl sees in a dream that she is petting a dog, then it is her enemy and close to her in reality, in the form of a friend, colleague, or girl from the family, she should avoid it on Launch. Times.Interpretation of seeing a black dog in a dream for a married woman. Interpretation of seeing black dogs in a dream for a married woman indicates envy of those around her. If a woman sees that she is married to a black dog that has injured some or parts of her body, this means that she did not care about her home, her husband, and her children, and she must take care of them. More.If a married woman sees that she is arguing with a black dog, it means that she wants to achieve something and does not succeed.If a married woman sees in a dream that a black dog is tearing her clothes, then this is not pleasant, and this is evidence of slander happening to the woman with wrong words.If a woman sees She is married to a black dog that hurts her badly, this means that there are many problems that she has not overcome. Interpretation of seeing a black dog in a dream for a man. Interpretation of seeing black dogs in a dream shows someone who attacked him and wanted to harm him, then this is a sign of an enemy who wants to harm him and destroy him. If one sees in Dreaming that a black dog is standing in his house or near it, this means a warning to him and his family. Black dogs in a dream can be beneficial and can be a cause of evil, for you

title: What do you know about the interpretation of a dream about a pit by Ibn Sirin?

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a hole by Ibn Sirin: Seeing a hole in a dream may make you feel that you will fall into it and wake up from your sleep afraid, and you may take a breath and in this case search for an interpretation that expresses the meaning of the dream and what it is. It indicates, and now we will explain to you what appeared in the interpretation of the dream from the words of Ibn Sirin. What is the interpretation of seeing a hole in a dream? If you see that you are emerging from a deep hole, then you are on the right path to getting rid of a major problem. But if the hole is narrow and you emerge from it after effort, If you are sick, your recovery will be soon (God willing), and if you are in debt and the earth is distressed by what is on it. Welcome because of the worries that followed the debts, this is a sign that you will be free from this as well, and having enough money to take care of your responsibilities. But if you see that someone is digging a hole and covering it with straw afterwards, and in a way you walk in the usual way, then someone will slander your boss To replace you. If a hole collapses inside you in a deep dimension, this is a sign of the failure that you are in and you cannot achieve a certain goal. What is the meaning of a hole in a dream by Ibn Sirin? Ibn Sirin said: Seeing a hole is not considered frightening in the understood sense, it is like other dreams that It carries more than one meaning and significance. Between these points, let us know what Ibn Sirin came up with. What does a good vision indicate: As for standing and looking at a certain hole and thinking about its depth, it is evidence that you are one of those who think a lot before making decisions, especially if they relate to critical matters. If you see that your wife About to fall into a hole, but suddenly fell backwards, the vision here may indicate a dispute between you and there is someone trying to exploit it to separate you, but the wife, with her wisdom and vitality. She was able to free herself from the influence of this person and returned to her senses and stability with her husband again. One of the good things that you find in a dream of falling into a hole is that you find beautiful things in it, such as food, drink, and so on, that make you prefer living in it rather than leaving it as it might be. Marriage sign if the dreamer is not married. What does a bad vision indicate: If someone you know throws you into this hole and leaves you and walks away, there are those who hate you and wish you harm from those close to you. However, if you are married and there are many problems between you and your wife During this period, you must be careful not to rush into the matter of separation and break up of the family, because falling into the pit unfortunately shows that. One of the disadvantages of this dream is that the pit is dark and that your screams inside it cannot be heard by anyone. This indicates that you will die soon if you are really sick with an illness. Dangerous. What is the interpretation of digging a hole in a dream? Commentators differed in the interpretation of this dream, and the difference came from the position that the dreamer will be in at the time of digging that hole. Here are some sayings about it: A girl who has reached marriageable age and the right person has not proposed to her, so her psychological state worsens with the continuation of menstruation. She is sure that waiting was for the best. But if one sees in a dream that unknown people are digging a big hole for him and is not afraid when he sees it, then there is a problem.
